html.p: Data Collection: User can collect Gsuite data with Input Add On for G Suite App.

Recommendation: Do not keep any of the GSuite related App and Add-on (G Suite For Splunk, TA for G Suite App) on the Search Head where Cyences or Enterprise Security installed as they have authentication tagging issues.

search.query: `cs_gsuite_login_events` | head 1 | stats count | eval data=if(count>0, "Data Present", "Data Not Present"), label="`cs_gsuite` sourcetype=gapps:report:login" | table label, data
`cs_gsuite_login_events` | search user=$tkn_user|s$ | stats count by login_type | sort 0 - count | head 10

table.title: User was asked for extra login question due to suspicious login activity

search.query: `cs_gsuite_login_events` user=$tkn_user|s$ event_name="login_challenge" | sort challenge_status | table _time, user, ipAddress, login_type, login_challenge_method, challenge_status

`cs_gsuite_login_events` user=$tkn_user|s$ event_name="login_failure" | stats latest(_time) as last_login_time, count, values(ipAddress) as ipAddress, values(login_type) as login_type, values(login_challenge_method) as login_challenge_method by user | eval last_login_time=strftime(last_login_time, "%F %T") | sort - count

`cs_gsuite_login_events` user=$tkn_user|s$ event_name="login_success" | stats latest(_time) as last_login_time, count, values(ipAddress) as ipAddress, values(login_type) as login_type, values(login_challenge_method) as login_challenge_method by user | eval last_login_time=strftime(last_login_time, "%F %T") | sort - count
`cs_gsuite_login_events` user=$tkn_user|s$ event_name="password_edit" | stats latest(_time) as _time, count, values(ipAddress) as ipAddress by user | sort - count

`cs_gsuite_login_events` user=$tkn_user|s$ NOT event_name IN ("login_challenge", "login_success", "login_failure", "logout", "login_verification", "password_edit") | table _time, user, ipAddress, event_name
